item.title: Clubs Swiss Chidokai
item.description: Find your nearest Swiss Chidokai dojo: Collonge-Bellerive, Gd-Saconnex, Genthod et Servette.   Dojo BIT Rue Sonnex 2 1218 Grand Saconnex Training hours Général: Monday 12h15-13h30 Général: Wednesday 12h15-13h30 Général: Friday 12h15-13h30   Dojo Servette Karate kids - Ecole de Cayla Shung Do Kwan Budo Ecole de Cayla 12 rue William-Lescaze 1203 Genève Training hours Enfants: Wednesday 16h30-17h30 Karate general - Ecole de Trembley Shung Do Kwan Budo Ecole de Trembley 14 rue Pestalozzi 1203 Genève Training hours Général: Tuesday 20h00-21h30 Général: Thursday 20h00-21h30   Dojo Collonge-Bellerive Route d'Hermance 101 1245 Collonge-Bellerive Training hours Enfants: Monday 16h30-17h30 Ado-Adultes: Monday 18h00-19h30 Ado-Adultes: Monday 19h30-21h00   Dojo Versoix Karate-Dô Chidokai Versoix Chemin de la Pralay 6 1294 Genthod Training hours Enfants: Friday 17h00-18h00 Général: Friday 18h00-20h00   Location Dojo Cayla Ecole de Cayla, 12 rue William-Lescaze, 1203 Genève    Location Dojo Collonge-Bellerive Route d'Hermance 101, 1245 Collonge-Bellerive   Courtyard entrance.
